title: Kinda Funny: The Animated Series - Ep. 11 "Dungeons and Dragons and Snack 'Ems"
description:
Ep. 1 "Politically Correct Dodgeball": https://youtu.be/2yhISvYtugM

Ep. 2 "Haters Gonna Hate": https://youtu.be/x-ukJa3fG2Y

Ep. 3 "Classic Colin": https://youtu.be/apfwjkYgcNQ

Ep. 4 "God Damn It, Barb": https://youtu.be/geCvT5Eyt9o

Ep. 5 "Sex Ed Class": https://youtu.be/pyARw2rBUpM

Ep. 6 "Portillo's Origin Story": https://youtu.be/-zUvl8HvTaM

Ep. 7 "Star Wars Christmas Special": https://youtu.be/TnMZmYc9hJc

Ep. 8 "VR Porn Part 1": https://youtu.be/KAsZtoRan_E

Ep. 9 "VR Porn Part 2": https://youtu.be/RtOWreoFBvY

Ep. 10 "Greg Miller is Scared of Sex": https://youtu.be/kCSPHpVKYHs

Music by Tonedeff - http://www.QN5.com
Theme music by Kory McMaster - http://www.twitter.com/KoryMcMaster

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
